titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 83) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the appointment of individuals to fill vacancies in the House of Representatives.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-519, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 83 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 183.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 657.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 195 (Roll no. 213).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 200, 1 Present (Roll no. 214).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/2/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H. J. Res. 83) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the appointment of individuals to fill vacancies in the House of Representatives.
